# BBrown Strategic Globalization Consulting Platform

## Project Overview
Visual web application for strategic globalization consulting, organizational mapping, and language consulting for BBrown.com clients.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- React with modern hooks
- TailwindCSS for styling
- D3.js/Recharts for visualizations
- i18next for internationalization
- Supabase/PostgreSQL for data persistence

## Key Features
- Interactive organizational mapping
- Language coverage analysis
- Market expansion planning tools
- Client consultation workflows
- Data-driven insights and visualizations

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow Next.js best practices
- Component-driven architecture
- Responsive design first
- Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- Professional consulting UX
